purpose_text.para: Accesses bits [63:32] of ERR<n>FR for the error record <n> selected by ERRSELR.SEL.

field_description.para: ERXFR2 accesses bits [63:32] of ERR<n>FR, where <n> is the value in ERRSELR.SEL.

access_permission_text.para: If ERRIDR.NUM is 0x0000 or ERRSELR.SEL is greater than or equal to ERRIDR.NUM, then one of the following occurs:

listitem.content: An UNKNOWN error record is selected.
Direct reads of ERXFR2 are NOPs.
Direct reads of ERXFR2 are UNDEFINED.

ps.name: MRC
